author: CNET
description:
In this debate, PCMag's Will Greenwald and CNET's Scott Stein square off to determine which has a stronger cultural impact: smart glasses or VR headsets. They'll discuss which technology is more practical for everyday use and debate its limitations and potential for the future.

0:00 Intro: AR Glasses vs. VR Headsets
0:08 The Debate Begins
0:35 Meet the Experts
1:14 Round 1: Elevator Pitch
1:26 Will's Pitch: Why Smart Glasses Win
2:20 Scott's Pitch: Why VR Headsets Win
3:51 Round 2: Takedown
4:54 VR Headsets: Too Heavy & Specialized?
6:52 Final Round: Google Glass Quiz
8:10 The Winner is Crowned
8:44 Final Thoughts & Outro

title: Smart Glasses Battle VR Headsets: Which Tech Sees the Future?

author: CNET
description:
After a month of wearing the Pixel Watch 4 the design still feels timeless and understated, but the parts that truly make this watch tick are under the surface: its intuitive UI, the seamless phone syncing and the way it works inside the Android ecosystem. 

But while the Pixel Watch 4 remains one of CNET Lead Wearables Writer Vanessa Hand Orellana’s favorite Android watches of 2025, there are some literal kinks in its armor that have started to surface with long-term, real-world use. Be sure to check out the full video in our bio. #pixelwatch4 #wearables #smartwatch #googlepixel #tech #madebygoogle
title: Google Pixel Watch 4: One Month Later ⌚️
